thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com
thread.title: Matthew Sturman

author: Matthew Sturman
title: Matthew Sturman
text: As I part ways with my business and move onto another endeavor, I just wanted to send a big thank you to Alison, Laura, and the entire Philadelphia Servcorp team for my great customer experience and tenure in renting my virtual office through them. The Servcorp team has a balance of being professional, personal, friendly, and accommodating that I've never seen in another company of any sort before. Whether I had a random or sporadic issue come up from things like expecting a check in the mail, a conference room, or flexibility around payment, the Servcorp team always put my interests first and helped me resolve every issue as soon as I reached out. If I ever have another business opportunity come up where I would need office space, they would be the first call I make and I would recommend them to any friend, family member, or colleague. THANK YOU AGAIN SERVCORP.
